definitions.definition: To cut off the pinion of a bird’s wing, or otherwise disable or bind its wings, in order to prevent it from flying.
To bind the arms of someone, so as to deprive him of their use; to disable by so binding.

main_definition: To cut off the pinion of a bird’s wing, or otherwise disable or bind its wings, in order to prevent it from flying.
secondary_definitions: To bind the arms of someone, so as to deprive him of their use; to disable by so binding.
( transferred sense , figurative ) To restrain ; to limit .
